Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #Epona's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in #Goron City# the hammer unlocks #a Hylian Shield#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask# yields #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #Queen Gohma#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Recovery Heart#.
